description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission 22/02905/FUL (Application under S73 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with condition 1 (Approved plans) of planning permission ref: 20/02495/FUL (Full planning application for the demolition of Surrey House, Multi Storey Car Park, Hippodrome and Bo Concept and the erection of 2(two) Office buildings [Use Class - E(g)(i)] Building A and Building B: Building A 9 storeys (22,144 (GEA) sqms) Building B 11 storeys (11,587 (GEA) sqms). The erection of a replacement multi storey car park of 354 spaces plus cycle parking (for use as a public car park at weekends) landscaping, public realm upgrades, servicing, pedestrian and vehicular access. This application is accompanied by an Environmental Statement) dated 02/12/2021. Variation consists of an update to the previously approved Condition 3 Discharge (22/03576/CLC)  which now includes an additional detailed list of all Multi Storey Car Park facing materials which was not previously submitted with Buildings A and B.
decision_conditions: In relation to previously approved 22/03576/CLC which approved Condition 03 of 20/02905/FUL, the approved development shall now be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:EDC-DAA-XX-XX-SP-A-9950-External Finishes Schedule A-B-C_C01Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
